title: Still Sitting Nomad Meditation Bench (Large, Black)
features: COMFORTABLE MEDITATION BENCH: Great for retreats and sitting for long periods.
KNEELING: Designed for use in the kneeling (seiza) position.
PORTABLE: Lightweight design makes this perfect for travel.
ADJUSTABLE: Height can be easily adjusted with strong velcro closure.
MADE IN THE USA: Handcrafted in the U.S. Designed by Norwegian architect, Asmund Skard.
description: The Nomad Meditation Bench is a simple, beautiful bench with a ground-breaking design. The Nomad combines comfort, portability, and flexibility in a way we haven’t seen in a meditation bench. You may choose one of two colors: natural or black. And one of two sizes: Medium (Nomad 1) or Large (Nomad 2). The Nomad is a kneeling bench, designed to be used only in the kneeling or seiza sitting position. It is handsomely crafted in the USA, right outside Seattle and designed by Norwegian architect, Åsmund Skard. Nomad 1 (medium) & Nomad 2 (large): We offer two sizes of Nomad – Nomad 1 and Nomad 2. The Nomad 1 is smaller and a little more portable. The Nomad 2 is larger and allows you to sit higher if you’d like. The Nomad 1 sitting height adjusts from approx. 5” – 9.5”. The Nomad 2 adjusts from approx. 6” – 11”. You’ll probably want a Nomad 1 (medium) if: You prefer a slightly lighter and smaller bench to travel with. You are small to medium height and build. You are any height and your knees are fairly flexible. You’ll probably want a Nomad 2 if: You are medium to large height and build. You are any height and have knees that are not-so-flexible. Nomad 1: Folded size is 17” x 6.25” x 1.5”. When open highest setting is 9.5”, lowest is 5”. Weight is 1 lb. 9 oz. Nomad 2: Folded size is 19” x 7” x 1.5”. When open highest setting is 11” high, lowest is 6”. Weight is 2lbs. 1 oz. Comfortable: It’s hammock-style seat conforms to your body and allows you to sit comfortably for hours at a time. Portable: This meditation bench is perfect for taking on the road. It folds nearly flat, is very light weight, and packs easily in a backpack or suitcase. Flexible: Unlike most benches, the Nomad allows you to change the height. By simply adjusting the Velcro on your fabric seat you may raise and lower the height for your perfect fit.
